00011 template <typename T, typename L = void*>
00012 class CallbackBridge {
00013   public:
00014     CallbackBridge(v8::Local<v8::Function>, bool);
00015     virtual ~CallbackBridge();
00016 
00017     // Executes the callback
00018     T operator()(std::vector<void*>);
00019 
00020   protected:
00021     // We will expose a bridge object to the JS callback that wraps this instance so we don't loose context.
00022     // This is the V8 constructor for such objects.
00023     static Nan::MaybeLocal<v8::Function> get_wrapper_constructor();
00024     static void async_gone(uv_handle_t *handle);
00025     static NAN_METHOD(New);
00026     static NAN_METHOD(ReturnCallback);
00027     static Nan::Persistent<v8::Function> wrapper_constructor;
00028     Nan::Persistent<v8::Object> wrapper;
00029 
00030     // The callback that will get called in the main thread after the worker thread used for the sass
00031     // compilation step makes a call to uv_async_send()
00032     static void dispatched_async_uv_callback(uv_async_t*);
00033 
00034     // The V8 values sent to our ReturnCallback must be read on the main thread not the sass worker thread.
00035     // This gives a chance to specialized subclasses to transform those values into whatever makes sense to
00036     // sass before we resume the worker thread.
00037     virtual T post_process_return_value(v8::Local<v8::Value>) const =0;
00038 
00039 
00040     virtual std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> pre_process_args(std::vector<L>) const =0;
00041 
00042     Nan::Callback* callback;
00043     bool is_sync;
00044 
00045     uv_mutex_t cv_mutex;
00046     uv_cond_t condition_variable;
00047     uv_async_t *async;
00048     std::vector<L> argv;
00049     bool has_returned;
00050     T return_value;
00051 };
00052 
00053 template <typename T, typename L>
00054 Nan::Persistent<v8::Function> CallbackBridge<T, L>::wrapper_constructor;
00055 
00056 template <typename T, typename L>
00057 CallbackBridge<T, L>::CallbackBridge(v8::Local<v8::Function> callback, bool is_sync) : callback(new Nan::Callback(callback)), is_sync(is_sync) {
00058   /* 
00059    * This is invoked from the main JavaScript thread.
00060    * V8 context is available.
00061    */
00062   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00063   uv_mutex_init(&this->cv_mutex);
00064   uv_cond_init(&this->condition_variable);
00065   if (!is_sync) {
00066     this->async = new uv_async_t;
00067     this->async->data = (void*) this;
00068     uv_async_init(uv_default_loop(), this->async, (uv_async_cb) dispatched_async_uv_callback);
00069   }
00070 
00071   v8::Local<v8::Function> func = CallbackBridge<T, L>::get_wrapper_constructor().ToLocalChecked();
00072   wrapper.Reset(Nan::NewInstance(func).ToLocalChecked());
00073   Nan::SetInternalFieldPointer(Nan::New(wrapper), 0, this);
00074 }
00075 
00076 template <typename T, typename L>
00077 CallbackBridge<T, L>::~CallbackBridge() {
00078   delete this->callback;
00079   this->wrapper.Reset();
00080   uv_cond_destroy(&this->condition_variable);
00081   uv_mutex_destroy(&this->cv_mutex);
00082 
00083   if (!is_sync) {
00084     uv_close((uv_handle_t*)this->async, &async_gone);
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 template <typename T, typename L>
00089 T CallbackBridge<T, L>::operator()(std::vector<void*> argv) {
00090   // argv.push_back(wrapper);
00091   if (this->is_sync) {
00092     /* 
00093      * This is invoked from the main JavaScript thread.
00094      * V8 context is available.
00095      *
00096      * Establish Local<> scope for all functions
00097      * from types invoked by pre_process_args() and
00098      * post_process_args().
00099      */
00100     Nan::HandleScope scope;
00101     Nan::TryCatch try_catch;
00102     std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> argv_v8 = pre_process_args(argv);
00103     if (try_catch.HasCaught()) {
00104       Nan::FatalException(try_catch);
00105     }
00106 
00107     argv_v8.push_back(Nan::New(wrapper));
00108 
00109     return this->post_process_return_value(
00110       this->callback->Call(argv_v8.size(), &argv_v8[0])
00111     );
00112   } else {
00113     /* 
00114      * This is invoked from the worker thread.
00115      * No V8 context and functions available.
00116      * Just wait for response from asynchronously
00117      * scheduled JavaScript code
00118      *
00119      * XXX Issue #1048: We block here even if the
00120      *     event loop stops and the callback
00121      *     would never be executed.
00122      * XXX Issue #857: By waiting here we occupy
00123      *     one of the threads taken from the
00124      *     uv threadpool. Might deadlock if
00125      *     async I/O executed from JavaScript callbacks.
00126      */
00127     this->argv = argv;
00128 
00129     uv_mutex_lock(&this->cv_mutex);
00130     this->has_returned = false;
00131     uv_async_send(this->async);
00132     while (!this->has_returned) {
00133       uv_cond_wait(&this->condition_variable, &this->cv_mutex);
00134     }
00135     uv_mutex_unlock(&this->cv_mutex);
00136     return this->return_value;
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 template <typename T, typename L>
00141 void CallbackBridge<T, L>::dispatched_async_uv_callback(uv_async_t *req) {
00142   CallbackBridge* bridge = static_cast<CallbackBridge*>(req->data);
00143 
00144   /* 
00145    * Function scheduled via uv_async mechanism, therefore
00146    * it is invoked from the main JavaScript thread.
00147    * V8 context is available.
00148    *
00149    * Establish Local<> scope for all functions
00150    * from types invoked by pre_process_args() and
00151    * post_process_args().
00152    */
00153   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00154   Nan::TryCatch try_catch;
00155 
00156   std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> argv_v8 = bridge->pre_process_args(bridge->argv);
00157   if (try_catch.HasCaught()) {
00158     Nan::FatalException(try_catch);
00159   }
00160   argv_v8.push_back(Nan::New(bridge->wrapper));
00161 
00162   bridge->callback->Call(argv_v8.size(), &argv_v8[0]);
00163 
00164   if (try_catch.HasCaught()) {
00165     Nan::FatalException(try_catch);
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 template <typename T, typename L>
00170 NAN_METHOD(CallbackBridge<T COMMA L>::ReturnCallback) {
00171 
00172   /* 
00173    * Callback function invoked by the user code.
00174    * It is invoked from the main JavaScript thread.
00175    * V8 context is available.
00176    *
00177    * Implicit Local<> handle scope created by NAN_METHOD(.)
00178    */
00179   CallbackBridge<T, L>* bridge = static_cast<CallbackBridge<T, L>*>(Nan::GetInternalFieldPointer(info.This(), 0));
00180   Nan::TryCatch try_catch;
00181 
00182   bridge->return_value = bridge->post_process_return_value(info[0]);
00183 
00184   {
00185     uv_mutex_lock(&bridge->cv_mutex);
00186     bridge->has_returned = true;
00187     uv_mutex_unlock(&bridge->cv_mutex);
00188   }
00189 
00190   uv_cond_broadcast(&bridge->condition_variable);
00191 
00192   if (try_catch.HasCaught()) {
00193     Nan::FatalException(try_catch);
00194   }
00195 }
00196 
00197 template <typename T, typename L>
00198 Nan::MaybeLocal<v8::Function> CallbackBridge<T, L>::get_wrapper_constructor() {
00199   /* Uses handle scope created in the CallbackBridge<T, L> constructor */
00200   if (wrapper_constructor.IsEmpty()) {
00201     v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> tpl = Nan::New<v8::FunctionTemplate>(New);
00202     tpl->SetClassName(Nan::New("CallbackBridge").ToLocalChecked());
00203     tpl->InstanceTemplate()->SetInternalFieldCount(1);
00204 
00205     Nan::SetPrototypeTemplate(tpl, "success",
00206       Nan::GetFunction(Nan::New<v8::FunctionTemplate>(ReturnCallback)).ToLocalChecked()
00207     );
00208 
00209     wrapper_constructor.Reset(Nan::GetFunction(tpl).ToLocalChecked());
00210   }
00211 
00212   return Nan::New(wrapper_constructor);
00213 }
00214 
00215 template <typename T, typename L>
00216 NAN_METHOD(CallbackBridge<T COMMA L>::New) {
00217   info.GetReturnValue().Set(info.This());
00218 }
00219 
00220 template <typename T, typename L>
00221 void CallbackBridge<T, L>::async_gone(uv_handle_t *handle) {
00222   delete (uv_async_t *)handle;
00223 }
